snippet.title: Gatekeeper - Official Developer Gameplay Overview | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into Gatekeeper, including gameplay and more from the fast-paced rogue-lite game. Additionally, learn about what you can expect from the game’s second demo, Gatekeeper Infinity, including new characters, locations, and more! Gatekeeper will be available in the fall of 2023, and the new free prologue will be available this summer. In Gatekeeper, go on a quest to find the stolen Heart of the Universe and shoot your way through the hordes of machine enemies guarding the planetary gates. Play solo or in co-op with friends and become the next Guardian.

#GameTrailers #SoG
